title: Patterns of Skin Disease among Prisoners in Central Prison in Nepal: A Descriptive Cross-sectional Study.
details: B Dhakal, PM Pangeni, PM Maharjan, S Rijal, S Wagle… - Journal of the Nepal …, 2024
abstract: Introduction: Skin diseases pose a significant health challenge globally, especially within prison settings where overcrowding and inadequate sanitation create a breeding ground for infections. Prisons, as part of society, exist in a dynamic …
